title: Opinion: Our podcast ‘Why Should I Trust You?’ connects MAHA and public health. Here’s what we’ve learned
description: According to “Why Should I Trust You?” hosts Tom W. Johnson and Brinda Adhikari, public health’s disengagement from MAHA has deepened mistrust.
content: According to “Why Should I Trust You?” hosts Tom W. Johnson and Brinda Adhikari, public health’s disengagement from MAHA has deepened mistrust.
